name: MESH BEANIE
description: A street style accessories with a girlie flare! Handmade by Yolanda Renee.

name: DOPE CHAIN LINK NECKLACE
description:
If you know me you know I'm always rocking a gold chain link necklace...so why wouldn't I have it in my boutique, duhhhh! Lol. Of course, this is costume jewelry so don't expect 14K gold...this is a very affordable and stylish option to rock with your natural hair and statement tees.

Short, Metal, Urban Glam, Bold, Statement

Gold

Gold

name: BAMBOO/DOOR KNOCKER EARRINGS
description:
My fav and signature piece...bamboo/door knocker earrings. I know yall have been waiting forever for these. So have I! I them shipped from China! Don't expect 14K gold...these are costume jewelry earrings but they are ohhhh soooo stylish! Its the perfect accessory for your big afro! There are a limited amount of these...so you better hurry up and purchase them! 

SHAPES AVAILABLE
CIRCLE, TRIANGLE, AND HEARTS

name: NYC HOLIDAY TRUNK SHOW DEAL- 'FROSACE
description: A Versace inspired design with my logo! Please keep in mind this t-shirt is 100% cotton and it is a larger tee. If you want it fitted definitely order a size down! If you wear a medium get a small. However, if you want a looser fit order your exact size. DO NOT GO A SIZE UP! TRUST ME! NATURAL PARTNERS IN CRIME have invited me to their NYC HOLIDAY TRUNK SHOW on December 14th at SUITE 116 (114 W 116th Street, Lower Level). This event is a one stop shop for everything #TEAMNATURAL! There will be vendors galore! To learn more visit, www.nycholidaytrunkshow.eventbrite.com I am please to announce that the t-shirt of the event from ETC BOUTIQUE will be the very popular FROSACE tee. This tee is perfect for every naturalista! And don't worry...you can throw a blazer on to make this weather appropriate! To celebrate this event you can get this tee for only $25 and free shipping if you will pick up your tee from the event! The tee is normally $28 plus shipping on www.etcboutique.spreadshirt.com! So there are major savings by taking advantage of this deal. Get yours now! This deal ends on DECEMBER 10, 2013! FYI | DO NOT TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THIS DEAL IF YOU ARE NOT AT THE TRUNK SHOW TO PICK UP YOUR MERCHANDISE!

name: CURLIES COLOR TOO
description: TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THE "STOCKING STUFFERS" DEAL. GET 5 BOOKS FOR ONLY $30. YOU SAVE 50%. ///// OFFER ENDS ON DECEMBER 1, 2013! ///// NEED THIS BOOK FOR A BULK ORDER FOR YOUR NEXT NATURAL HAIR EVENT. WELL THERE ARE A FEW PACKAGE DEALS FOR YOU TOO! EMAIL etc.yolandarenee@gmail.com FOR OTHER WHOLESALE PRICES. I am proud to announce that I've published my first book! Well a coloring book with some other helpful information included. This is not just a coloring book but this is also a hairstyle book to help mothers and daughters have fun with their natural hair. The illustrations are of curlie girls with natural hair and they are also styles that you can create. Also included are activities to help your child learn to count, recognize shapes, learn the alphabet, write their names and more! And an added bonus for Mothers are a list curlie girl books, hair products, hair styles, and my personal hair regimen for my daughters Taylor and Skylar. This is a fun resource to help you and your daughters to love their natural hair! 8.5" x 11" (21.59 x 27.94 cm) Full Color on White paper 38 pages ISBN-13: 978-1492868736 (CreateSpace-Assigned) ISBN-10: 1492868736 BISAC: Juvenile Fiction / Activity Books Also available on: AMAZON CREATESPACE
